personalInfo.name: Juan Rosero
personalInfo.title: Senior Full Stack Developer & Squad Lead

professionalSummary: I have 7+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading development teams. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and GraphQL with a strong design mindset and proven track record of delivering user-focused solutions. Currently serving as Squad Lead at Engine AI, driving technical decisions and mentoring team members across complex feature implementations.

experience.position: Senior Full Stack Developer & Squad Lead
experience.description: Leading development team while contributing to a data insights platform serving finance sector clients.
achievements: Team Leadership: Manage and mentor development team, conducting code reviews and driving technical decisions across end-to-end feature implementations
Technical Architecture: Designed and implemented the first version of the PostgreSQL database for widget and dashboard data, supporting scalable data visualizations
Frontend Innovation: Created a flexible theming system enabling platform customization for client brand requirements, directly contributing to new sales opportunities
Product Development: Built the UI for the company's first Chat Assistant and integrated it with existing data visualization widgets
DevOps & Testing: Developed and maintain the Product Testing website with Docker and Azure services, enabling developers to preview and debug AI Agent responses
Client Success: Created multiple custom platform versions for high-stakes demos, directly supporting business development efforts

experience.description: Delivered technical solutions for major Ecuadorian brands including General Motors and Multicines.
achievements: Email Marketing Platform: Built a comprehensive email management system for Multicines cinema chain, enabling targeted campaigns to thousands of users with performance-optimized data retrieval
Lead Management System: Migrated General Motors' PHP backend to Node.js, redesigned React frontend, and implemented Elasticsearch for improved search functionality
Performance Optimization: Implemented efficient data pulling strategies to handle large-scale user data while maintaining system performance

experience.description: Developed internal platforms for a software development outsourcing company.
achievements: Component Library: Created and maintained React component library using Storybook, serving as foundation for internal and external platforms
Platform Development: Built customer-employee management platform with React frontend and NestJS backend
Career Development: Completed JSchool program with merit, progressing from bootcamp participant to full-time developer

experience.description: Co-founded and developed a complete property listing platform from concept to launch.
achievements: Database Design: Architected MongoDB database model adaptable to changing requirements in an unexplored market
Design System: Implemented Material UI-based design system using Polymer components
Payment Integration: Integrated PayPal and custom bank transfer solutions with automated receipt generation for tax compliance
SEO Optimization: Developed server-side rendering solution for single-page application to improve search engine visibility
DevOps: Established deployment pipeline using Heroku, successfully launching platform in 2017

details: Full merit scholarship awarded by the State
Thesis: Bottle image classification system using Convolutional Neural Networks
Equivalent to Masters in Computer Science (European standard)

keyStrengths.title: Technical Leadership
keyStrengths.description: Proven ability to lead development teams while maintaining hands-on technical contribution and code quality standards.

keyStrengths.title: Design-Focused Development
keyStrengths.description: Strong emphasis on user experience and visual design, ensuring technical solutions align with user needs and business objectives.

keyStrengths.title: Cross-Cultural Communication
keyStrengths.description: Experience working across international teams and clients, with strong communication skills for technical and non-technical stakeholders.

keyStrengths.title: Problem-Solving
keyStrengths.description: Solution-oriented approach to challenges, focusing on practical outcomes rather than obstacles.

keyStrengths.title: Adaptability
keyStrengths.description: Successfully navigated multiple technology stacks and business domains, from marketing platforms to financial data insights.
